ENGLISH: \c[1]Casamir has met his fate, and with him dies his empire.
KOREAN: \c[1]카사미르는 자기 운명을 만났고, 그와 함께 제국도 멸망한다.

ENGLISH:
\c[1]The way to the inner sanctum of the Followers of Zanatus is now open. The cult remains defiant in their defense of Lightfury, the divine weapon of Donar.\! To 
[8], it is the final step in 
[27] realization of 
[27] destiny.
